The food, the drinks and the service were all amazing!I got the patatas bravas and the zee breeze sandwich which is brie, apple, caramelized onion and balsamic glaze put into a panini press. Both were outstanding. The patatas bravas is a huge portion and are the best I've ever had. The mojito was also delicious.It was a big group of us on a random weekday night so only one man was working and he was so kind, friendly and accommodating.The place is pretty small so I could see it getting really crowded and tables being hard to get on a weekend. I can't wait to go back - a must go right next to Sagrada Familia!
